comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: One possibility is that she is the wife of Charles Adams Holder. After some hunting, a source I have found with her name is The Lewiston Daily Sun - Jun 30, 1933 news.google.com/newspapers?nid=1928&dat=19330630&..., which indicates that after her death, her husband was to marry the widow of Enrico Caruso. She is named as the former Margaretta Bonsall Taylor of Philadelphia.
